author: jericho
msg: - Don't make any reading and writing to the input and output stream the current connection.
(It make the web-server hang or conflict after that)

author: rwaldhoff
msg: add setRequestBody(String) method to PostMethod, and some tests for it

author: marcsaeg
msg: Removed test for invalid secure attribute on cookies.  We now allow this
Someone (probably me, later) should add some additional test cases to
ensure that we only add secure cookies to the Cookie header for secure

author: marcsaeg
msg: No longer throw an HttpException when a secure cookie is received on a
non-secure connection.  According to RFC 2109 this is not an invalid
However, createCookieHeader() still only adds secure cookies to a Cookie
header if the connection is secure.

author: marcsaeg
msg: Added some tests for constructors that specify a URL.
